content:
s a more extreme example of nonrigorous testing:
TABLE3
Case 1:A~B  C  D  G
Case 2:A~B~C~D~G
Case 3:A~BC~D~G
Case 4:A~B~C  D  G
Here candidate feature Ais eliminated by SCT (in Cases 2 and 3) but is
not eliminated by NCT, so it is a possible necessary condition but not a
possible sufficient condition for target feature G. Bis not eliminated by
SCT but is eliminated by NCT (in Cases 1 and 4), so it is a possible suffi-
cient condition but not a possible necessary condition for target feature G.
